post.body: I drove on top of a rock wall once when it was slippery and once into a frozen irrigation pond.
mine always beg for food, especially cheese.
Watching poor Leo (the dog) play. He was just hiding under a chair shaking because the smoke alarm went off.
Hey I figured out how to add people and I have followers! yay!!
Going to watch tv for a bit then wear the dog out so he will actually sleep tonight!
Having $1 shipping in my Etsy shop! http://smilingfrogs.etsy.com
Checking facebook, need to go get Etsy orders together.
Just finished applique-ing the most awesome skirt!
